Text: Is this the updated version with the controller utility?

@IndigoAK

No, it is not. However, Joy2Key works perfectly. Just be sure to tweak the joystick settings so it isn't too sensitive.

Do not download this. It's infected: https://www.metascan-online.com/en/scanresult/file/c423b935f5a44db8b89f82e8a00edd6b
